name: Cook the Book: Blood Orange and Bacon Hangover Salad
description: [Photograph: Caroline Russock] Maybe it's that last glass of wine or a second martini, but every once in a while we overdo it. And most of the time, the next morning your stomach is feeling as fuzzy as your head...
recipeIngredient: Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
1 head Boston lettuce (or another leafy green lettuce, such as green leaf or red leaf)
1 large or 2 small blood oranges, peel removed and slices cut out without the pith (membrane that separates the slices)

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, combine the red wine vinegar, mustard, and a couple of pinches of salt and pepper. Drizzle in the olive oil while whisking rapidly until mixture is emulsified. Gently tear lettuce into bite-sized pieces. Toss with the dressing and remaining ingredients. Serve immediately.
